channel.title: Idaho on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Idaho on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-15 South - Entering Clark County
item.description: I-15 south Entering Clark Count and Leaving Montana. Taken on Monida Pass on the Continental Divide between Idaho and Montana.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - US-91 North
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-91 North.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - ID-8 East
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on ID-8 east. Entering Moscow. Moscow is home to the University of Idaho.

item.title: I-84 West - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on I-84 west at the Utah border.

item.title: US-12 East To US-95 - Levee Bypass
item.description: US-12 East - To US-95 on the Levee Bypass in Lewiston.

item.title: US-12 East - Interstate Bridge
item.description: US-12 east on Interstate Bridge over Snake River. Merge right to continue east on US-12.

item.title: US-12 East - Idaho State Line
item.description: Errant US-12 shield displayed as a state route shield on the Interstate bridge over the Snake River on the Idaho border.

item.title: End WY-239 at Stateline Road - To ID-34
item.description: End WY-239 at Stateline Road. Turn right on Stateline Road to ID-34, Wayan, and Soda Springs.

item.title: I-15 North - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on I-15 North at the Utah/Idaho border.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - US-195 South
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-195 south. US-195 ends at US-95 just south of here.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - ID-51 North
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on ID-51 north. Taken on Idaho’s only highway crossing with Nevada.

item.title: ID-71 North - Idaho/Oregon Line
item.description: ID-71 south at the Oregon line.

item.title: ID-71 North - Idaho/Oregon Line
item.description: ID-71 south at the Oregon line.

item.title: Hells Canyon Scenic Byway
item.description: Hells Canyon Scenic Byway on NF-454 north, just east of the Oregon-Idaho Line at the Snake River.

item.title: End ID-71 North - Idaho/Oregon Line
item.description: End ID-71 north at the Idaho-Oregon line on the Snake River.

item.title: ID-71 South - Idaho State Line
item.description: Idaho State Line on ID-71 south. This is a non standard state line sign.

item.title: ID-66 South - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome To Idaho on ID-66 South, ID-WA Border

item.title: Kingsport, BC Customs Station
item.description: Customs Canada at End of US-95 North

item.title: US-Canada Border - Eastport, ID/Kingsgate, BC
item.description: The international bounday between United States and Canada at the Easport,ID/Kingsgate, BC border crossing. The picture is taken right on the international boundary. You can see a swath of trees cut down at the border itself, and you can see that same swath as a notch at the top of the ridge in the background. United States is to the left - Canada to the right.
